nodes.text: The Parnelli Museum of Art was a museum built in the capital city of Theed on Naboo.

A low-lying rotunda in the city of Theed, the Parnelli Museum of Art was located next to the Triumphal Arch on a street running parallel to Palace Plaza. The domed roof, held up by stately columns, was tiled in green in keeping with the city's tradition. In 52 BBY, Ambassador Palpatine met with Sate Pestage in a small plaza beside the museum to discuss the details of the assassination of Vidar Kim.
